org.springframework.data.redis.support.atomic

类 RedisAtomicDouble

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • org.springframework.data.redis.support.atomic.RedisAtomicDouble
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, BoundKeyOperations<String>

    public class RedisAtomicDouble
extends Number
implements Serializable, BoundKeyOperations<String>
    Atomic double backed by Redis. Uses Redis atomic increment/decrement and watch/multi/exec operations for CAS operations.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RedisAtomicDouble

        public RedisAtomicDouble(String redisCounter,
                         RedisConnectionFactory factory)
        Constructs a new RedisAtomicDouble instance. Uses the value existing in Redis or 0 if none is found.
        参数:
        redisCounter - Redis key of this counter.
        factory - connection factory.

      • RedisAtomicDouble

        public RedisAtomicDouble(String redisCounter,
                         RedisConnectionFactory factory,
                         double initialValue)
        Constructs a new RedisAtomicDouble instance.
        参数:
        redisCounter - Redis key of this counter.
        factory - connection factory.
        initialValue - initial value to set if the Redis key is absent.

      • RedisAtomicDouble

        public RedisAtomicDouble(String redisCounter,
                         RedisOperations<String,Double> template)
        Constructs a new RedisAtomicDouble instance. Uses the value existing in Redis or 0 if none is found.
        参数:
        redisCounter - Redis key of this counter.
        template - the template.
        另请参阅:
        RedisAtomicDouble(String, RedisConnectionFactory, double)

      • RedisAtomicDouble

        public RedisAtomicDouble(String redisCounter,
                         RedisOperations<String,Double> template,
                         double initialValue)
        Constructs a new RedisAtomicDouble instance. Note: You need to configure the given template with appropriate RedisSerializer for the key and value. As an alternative one could use the RedisAtomicDouble(String, RedisConnectionFactory, Double) constructor which uses appropriate default serializers.
        参数:
        redisCounter - Redis key of this counter.
        template - the template
        initialValue - initial value to set if the Redis key is absent.

      • compareAndSet

        public boolean compareAndSet(double expect,
                             double update)
        Atomically sets the value to the given updated value if the current value == the expected value.
        参数:
        expect - the expected value.
        update - the new value.
        返回:
        true if successful. false indicates that the actual value was not equal to the expected value.

      • getAndIncrement

        public double getAndIncrement()

      • expire

        public Boolean expire(long timeout,
                      TimeUnit unit)
        从接口复制的说明: BoundKeyOperations

        指定者:

        参数:
        timeout - expiration value
        unit - expiration unit
        返回:
